data.name: Impostor Factory - The Bestest Dancers Comic
data.detailed_description:
The Bestest Dancers is an official SigCorp. comic drawn by Del, with stories written by Kan Gao & Del.

Featuring a collection of stories with characters from the SigCorp. series, the comic spans 7 parts across over seventy pages, including bonus illustrations.

. . . It contains spoilers for Impostor Factory too, so best play the game first! d-(' ' d-)
data.about_the_game:
The Bestest Dancers is an official SigCorp. comic drawn by Del, with stories written by Kan Gao & Del.

Featuring a collection of stories with characters from the SigCorp. series, the comic spans 7 parts across over seventy pages, including bonus illustrations.

. . . It contains spoilers for Impostor Factory too, so best play the game first! d-(' ' d-)
data.short_description: Following the peculiar events of the To the Moon series’ 3rd instalment, Impostor Factory, there’s no telling just what kind of shenanigans the SigCorp Doctors are up to this time. . . . Except in this comic. This comic tells it.
data.supported_languages: English, Korean, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil
